name: Air Flying WW1
description: A simple game. Time of action in the game First World War. You play as allies. Your goal is to shoot down all enemy planes and end this terrible war. Feel free to rate the game and leave comments. The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :) --------------------------------------------------------- Game controls: mouse --------------------------------------------------------- Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets !!! Graphics: *Mobile Game Graphics ---------------------------------------------------------
